AddressInfo.Title: Downtown Portland Electric Avenue
AddressInfo.AccessComments: Located in downtown Portland on SW Salmon St. at the World Trade Center.

GeneralComments:
$5.00 flat fee per DC fast charging session and $3.00 flat fee per Level 2 charging session. An additional peak charging fee of $0.19 per kWh applies on weekdays from 3 PM to 8 PM. Monthly memberships are available at PortlandGeneral.com/ElectricAvenue and replace all flat fees with a single monthly payment of $25.00 (note: peak charging fees still apply). No parking meter payment required while vehicles are actively charging at Electric Avenue. The two-hour time limit still applies.

Electric Avenue provides four 50 kW DC fast chargers with CHAdeMO & CCS/SAE connectors and two 6.7 kW Level 2 stations with EV Plug connectors.
